title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 242 - CO[2] Budget Trading Program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 242 - CO[2] Budget Trading Program

State Regulations

Subpart 242-1 - CO[2] BUDGET TRADING PROGRAM GENERAL PROVISIONS (§ 242-1.1 to 242-1.7)

Subpart 242-2 - CO[2] AUTHORIZED ACCOUNT REPRESENTATIVE FOR CO[2] BUDGET SOURCES (§ 242-2.1 to 242-2.6)

Subpart 242-3 - PERMITS (§ 242-3.1 to 242-3.3)

Subpart 242-4 - COMPLIANCE CERTIFICATION (§ 242-4.1 to 242-4.2)

Subpart 242-5 - CO[2] ALLOWANCE ALLOCATIONS (§ 242-5.1 to 242-5.3)

Subpart 242-6 - CO[2] ALLOWANCE TRACKING SYSTEM (§ 242-6.1 to 242-6.8)

Subpart 242-7 - CO[2] ALLOWANCE TRANSFERS (§ 242-7.1 to 242-7.3)

Subpart 242-8 - MONITORING AND REPORTING (§ 242-8.1 to 242-8.8)

Subpart 242-9 - RESERVED
Subpart 242-10 - CO[2] EMISSIONS OFFSET PROJECTS (§ 242-10.1 to 242-10.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 242

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 1-0303, 3-0301, 11-0303, 11-0305, 11-0535, 13-0105, 15-0109, 15-1903, 16-0111, 17-0303, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0107, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 24-0103, 25-0102, 34-0108, 49-0309, 71-2103, 71-2105; Energy Law, §§3-101, 3-103; Public Authorities Law, §§1850, 1851, 1854, 1855

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
